page.title: 15WARRINGTON FESTIVAL
page.content: The first {Festival} was held in 1972. It provides entertainment of all kinds through a variety of events. A survey by Central London Polytechnic has vindicated the claim that it is "{The Best In The North West}". The Festival can take up to two years to organise, some typical events being; Warrington Secondary Schools Music Festival, The Festival Tennis Tournament, Finals Day and Festival Fun Day. For the Festival to continue in its present form, funds must be attracted in the form of sponsorships and other means. This responsibility is taken on by representatives of the Borough Council,the Development Corporation and Industry and Commerce.
